Package edu.lehigh.cse216.rubber_ducks.backend

Interface DatabaseInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Database, MockDatabase
public interface DatabaseInterface
Interface for a Database class Methods are common database operations

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createTable()
    Creates a table by calling a prepared statement
    int

    Deletes the row of the given id in the database

    Drops a table using prepared statements

  • Method Details

    • insertRow

      int insertRow(String proposal, int numLikes)
      Method to insert a row into the database
      Parameters:
      proposal - the text of a new idea
      numLikes - the number of likes for the proposal
      Returns:
      the number of rows added

    • selectAll

      List<DataRow> selectAll()
      Returns a list of all rows in the database instance
      Returns:
      the number of rows returned

    • selectOne

      DataRow selectOne(int id)
      Returns a single row of the database for the given id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the row being selected
      Returns:
      the DataRow representation of the selected row

    • deleteRow

      int deleteRow(int id)
      Deletes the row of the given id in the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of the row being deleted
      Returns:
      the number of rows deleted

    • updateOne

      int updateOne(int id, int numLikes)
      Updates one row in the database. It modifies the number of likes
      Parameters:
      id - id of the row being updated
      numLikes - number of likes being added
      Returns:
      the number of rows updated (1 if successful)

    • createTable

      void createTable()
      Creates a table by calling a prepared statement

    • dropTable

      void dropTable()
      Drops a table using prepared statements
